channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Malibu Wildfire: Firefighters Begin Containing the Blaze That Destroyed Several Homes
item.description: The Franklin fire grew to nearly 4,000 acres overnight as firefighters battled difficult conditions and steep terrain.

item.title: Albertsons gives up on $24.6 billion Kroger merger and instead sues the chain for not doing enough to get deal approved
item.description: The move came the day after two judges halted the merger in separate court cases.

item.title: Al-Assad Is Gone, and One Idea Fills My Brain
item.description: On Sunday at 3 a.m. my mother woke me with a shaky voice. All our phones were ringing and the TV was loud. “He fell, Zaina, he fell. Assad fell.”

item.title: Billionaire hedge fund exec and Mets owner Steve Cohen never wanted to stop working as a young trader: ‘I couldn’t wait for Mondays. I hated my weekends.’
item.description: The best traders are just like the best baseball players: "They can't wait to work, even in the offseason."

item.title: How Rocket Companies’ first-ever CTO is deploying AI aimed at making home buying easier
